resourceTemplates.name: handelsregister-search-organizations
resourceTemplates.title: Search German Organizations
resourceTemplates.description: Search German companies using a query string with pagination (skip/limit) and optional filters such as postal_code.

resourceTemplates.name: handelsregister-fetch-organization
resourceTemplates.title: Fetch Organization (including optional features)
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieve detailed company information including optional features such as financial_kpi, related_persons, publications, shareholders, and website_content.

resourceTemplates.title: Fetch Official Register Document (PDF)
resourceTemplates.description: Download official Handelsregister PDF documents such as shareholders_list, articles_of_association, AD (current excerpt), or CD (historical excerpt).
